abstract: JPMorgan Chase shares tumbled nearly 10 percent Tuesday as the bank’s disclosure about escalating losses in its mortgage portfolio set off new concerns about the health of the overall financial sector.
snippet: JPMorgan Chase shares tumbled nearly 10 percent Tuesday as the bank’s disclosure about escalating losses in its mortgage portfolio set off new concerns about the health of the overall financial sector.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase shares tumbled nearly 10 percent Tuesday as the bank’s disclosure about escalating losses in its mortgage portfolio set off new concerns about the health of the overall financial sector. An analyst’s lowering of the bank’s earnings estimates and price target contributed to the decline.

headline.main: JPMorgan Shares Drop on Mortgage Losses
